  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.awt.Point ballPoint, int width, int height, java.awt.Rectangle container)
      Constructor to create a player class
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - The coordinates of the point of the ball that touches the player paddle
      width - The width of the player
      height - The height of the player
      container - The rectangle shape of the player paddle

  • Method Details

    • impact

      public boolean impact​(Ball b)
      Method that determines whether the ball touches the player's paddle
      Parameters:
      b - The ball object
      Returns:
      True if the ball touches the player's paddle, False if the ball did not touch the player's paddle

      Method to move the player's paddle

      Method to stop the player's paddle from moving

    • getPlayerFace

      public java.awt.Shape getPlayerFace()
      Getter to get the shape of the player's paddle
      Returns:
      The shape of the player's paddle

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
      Method to move the player's paddle to a specific point
      Parameters:
      p - The coordinates of the point for the player's paddle to move to
